ygData.subject: Shining Star of Light
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, I want to do the SSoL quest.  I am a 16th level Hafling cleric of Bristlebane.  The problem, I think lies with my faction in the Temple of Life. Aeston
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all,

I want to do the SSoL quest. I am a 16th level Hafling cleric of
Bristlebane. The problem, I think lies with my faction in the Temple of
Life. Aeston Wemur cons apprehensive, and when I ask him for the
instructions, he gives them to me, until I ask him about travelling afar,
after which he says that the word is out not to trust me.

THis particualarily sucks because I gave him the honeyjum, and instead of
giving me the potion, he said my name was bad, not to trust me, etc. And he
took my honeyjum!!

So, my question is, how do I raise my faction with the Temple of Life?
